basics.name: Shoaib Ahmed Khan
basics.label: Software Architect
basics.summary:
A software enthusiast. I have been working as a developer for around a decade. During 
this time, I have got a chance to visit various domains and technologies, which helped in
shaping myself on how I think and work now. I like to create software and helping other
developers like me around. Some recent technologies I have been working are PHP,
NodeJs, Docker, Java and other of such kind. My main focus is towards the problem
solving, irrespective of the platform

work.name: PureVPN
work.description: Solving the problem of connecting the right candidate to the needful hirers
work.summary: Gaditek is a human-centric New Age company. We innovate relentlessly and are always venturing into new markets with our employees.
highlights: Contributed to PureVpn's overall product & technology strategy and aligning systems with that strategy.
Ensured that systems are fit for purpose, well architected and follow current PureVpn's development practices.
Maintained platform health, by ensuring that our systems are secure, reliable, resilient and cost effective.
Drove customer focus to ensure that we are delivering great outcomes for our customers.
Commenced and maintained a high performing team culture that values collaboration, learning and continual improvement.
Participated in planning and evaluation meetings to identify problems and propose business solutions.

work.name: PureVPN
work.description: Solving the problem of connecting the right candidate to the needful hirers
work.summary: Gaditek is a human-centric New Age company. We innovate relentlessly and are always venturing into new markets with our employees.
highlights: Performed the duties as the Lead Software Engineer for the PureVpn's Backend Team.
Participated in processes concerning the architecture to meet inter departmental needs.
Facilitate product development and fulfillment by adopting ‘Scrum’ Agile development methodology.
Implemented Micro service architecture between API’s to make the product ready for providing PaaS (Platform as a Service) services

capable of serving millions of customers .
 Automate processes and problem resolution to enhance productivity of existing systems.

work.name: Exact
work.description: Cloud business software for SMEs and their accountants
work.summary: We are Exact. We make smart business software. We are entrepreneurial and dream big, just like you. We help and encourage anyone we work with to always be the best version of themselves.
highlights: Helped to come up with an end-to-end pipeline to build and release the product.
Performed various tasks including coding, building, testing, releasing and debugging the product.
Made massive use of automation, including development and in release cycles.
Helped to produce tools that are helpful during the lifecycle of the product. Usually as a need to support the product.
Helped POC the product initially with our customers to set up our product owner for the success of the product.

work.name: Hexosys
work.description: Albaloo is a fast growing location based advertising platform, consists of Mobile App, Web Portal, Social Media Fan Pages and 3rd Party Advertising Partners.
work.summary: Accomplishing more than 150 main products as cutting-edge technology protocol/bus analyzers, reveals great ability of HexoSys to delivering new projects within the field of expertise with complete maturity and high competitive to the global high-tech market.
highlights: Helped in complete overhaul and rewriting parts of the Albaloo product.
Added the ability of targetting users through multi communication channels (SMS, emails, mobile notifications etc).
Helped product with identifying with and implementing the ability of geo fencing the ads in the current platform.
Introduced a custom framework on top of Laravel's current implementation to support custom JavaScript loading in the layout.
Initialized and laid the basis for automation in the project; Through simplifying and making some tedious task, process oriented.

work.name: Pi-Labs
work.description: A service provider for various kinds of software needs to our clients.
work.summary: Our passion for mobile software and our ability to deliver engaging solutions has given us much acclaim. Early adoption of Windows Phone 7 meant we were one of the first companies globally to have delivered an app to the Microsoft Marketplace, yet our expertise encompasses the breadth of the smartphone ecosystems including iOS, Android and Palm’s WebOS.
highlights: This was my earliest position as a technical leader and I myself were going through a major learning.
Helped organization with various services based project; Dealth with various platforms and technologies.
Created, architected and maintained a home grown idea that later shifted to become Garfield's official game, known as Feed Garfield. The internal project name was Candy Pot. It was a team effort.

Created, architected and maintained an idea in collaboration with our partner. It was a video and audio processing app; These were early days when snapchat didn't existed; The project was named Gulf Talk.
Worked on an aggregator banking solution known as Mobank for UK based banks. Clients were able to control their various accounts through this app.
Pioneered the space of Windows 8 initial launching apps for Microsoft Singapore; Some of them were CNA, DBS Bank Singapore, The Straits Times Singapore
Worked on various 2d and 3d games.
Used and improved Cocos2dx platform to flourish 2d games on cross platform technologies.
Written several frameworks my self and opensourced it later to help the community; To mention some: EasyNDK-for-cocos2dx, Easy-CURL-for-PHP
Gelled along with various individual contributors to help organization meet its financial goal and beyond.
Presented learnings and findings at various university events and global technology events.

education.name: National University of Computer and Emerging Sciences

awards.title: IASA IT Architecture Core (ITAC) – CITAF Certification
awards.summary: Anchors to the beginning of Architect position and responsibilities

awards.title: Won the GIKI SOFTCOM 08 (Programming Competition)
awards.summary: A speed programming competition of national level

references.name: Heinrich Rust
references.reference: Amir is surely missed by his team/peers and I think any company would find great benefit with the addition of Amir to their leadership and technical team. Wish you all the best Amir and hope our paths cross again.

references.name: Paul Fitzgerald
references.reference: As a colleague Amir is friendly, personable, has an easy manner and great sense of humour. A clear communicator with a voice for radio, Amir is wise head on young shoulders.

projects.name: Miss Direction
projects.description: A mapping engine that misguides you
highlights: Won award at AIHacks 2016
Built by all women team of newbie programmers
Using modern technologies such as GoogleMaps, Chrome Extension and Javascript
